questions.question: What is the requirement for an expense report to be approved at ArkLeap Technologies?

questions.question: What is the per diem travel allowance for a traveler at ArkLeap Technologies?
questions.explanation: According to the content, the traveler at ArkLeap Technologies will have $50 per diem as travel allowance.

questions.question: What is the policy for business and first-class travel at ArkLeap Technologies?

options.A: It is allowed and covered by the company
options.B: It is allowed only if it is at the employee’s expense
options.C: It is not allowed under any circumstances
options.D: It is allowed with the approval of the employee’s supervisor

questions.explanation: According to the content, business and first-class travel are not allowed at ArkLeap Technologies unless it is at the employee’s expense.

source.context:
ArkLeap Technolgies
Exceptions to this policy statement will be allowed with approval of the employee’s 
supervisor so that the additional cost is authorized. Business and First-Class travel are not allowed unless it is at the employee’s expense.
